feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: I thought you were asleep,' sobbed Beth.

feels.name: Restlessness
feels.quote: I feel restless, and anxious to be seeing, doing, and learning more than I am.

causedByEvent.name: Desire for change and new experiences

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: I'm afraid--Laurie is getting too fond of me.
